mapper.select: SELECT SREG.NAME, SREG.TEL, SREG.SIT_REG_ID, SBAC.REG_DATE, SREJ.REJECTED_DATE, SRRE.REASON FROM SIT_REJECTED SREJ, SIT_REJECTED_REASONS SRRE, SIT_BACKUP SBAC, SIT_REG SREG WHERE SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SREJ.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SREG.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND SREJ.SIT_REJECTED_REASON_ID = SRRE.SIT_REJECTED_REASON_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM SIT_REJECTED
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SIT_REJECTED(SIT_REJECTED_ID, SIT_BACKUP_ID, SIT_REJECTED_REASON_ID) VALUES(#{sit_rejected_id}, #{sit_backup_id}, #{sit_rejected_reason_id})
